casebody.data:
GARRETT
v.
WILSON. No. 302P07. Supreme Court of North Carolina. July 3, 2007. Tobias S. Hampson, Raleigh, for Wilson.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 29th day of June 2007 by Defendant for Temporary Stay:

"Motion Denied by order of the Court in conference this the 3rd day of July 2007."
